page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT DUNLOP
page.content:
WHEN PEOPLE COME HOME FROM WORK THEY OFTEN LIKE TO HAVE SOME ENTERTAINMENT. THE PUB DOWN ON MAIN STREET IS CALLED THE "AULD HOOSE". IT HAS A SNOOKER TABLE, A DART BOARD AND A{PUGIE} MACHINE TOO.SOME PEOPLE ALSO GO TO THE HOTEL BECAUSE THEY PREFER IT.THE CHILDREN CAN GO TO ONE OF THE ORGANIZED GROUPS LIKE SCOUTS,BROWNIES ETC AND ALSO GYMNASTICS, FOR OLDER CHILDREN THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB. ALTHOUGH THERE ARE COFFEE MORNINGS, FETES,GALAS AND SALES OF WORK, MOST OF THE TIME PEOPLE HAVE TO PROVIDE THEIR OWN ENTERTAINMENT,OR TRAVEL OUT OF THE VILLAGE.
{"PUGIE" }IS SOMETHING LIKE A ONE ARMED BANDIT.YOU PUT IN YOUR MONEY,PULL THE HANDLE AND TRY AND GET THREE SYMBOLS EXACTLY THE SAME.
